directions: Mix vinegar and mustard in bowl. Gradually mix in oil. Add cheese and capers. Season with salt and pepper.
Place 1/4 head romaine on each plate. Spoon dressing over and serve.
ingredients: 4 ounces Maytag or Danish blue cheese, crumbled
1 small head romaine lettuce, trimmed, quartered lengthwise
title: Hearts of Romaine with Blue Cheese and Caper Dressing
